Geger Anggaran Aneh DKI, PKS: Saatnya Anies Harus Ada Pendamping
02 Nov 2019, 05:14 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Fraksi Partai Keadilan Sejahtera (F-PKS) DPRD DKI mendorong adanya wakil gubernur untuk mendampingi Anies Baswedan di Pemprov. Sebab, F-PKS menganggap kekosongan kursi DKI-2 menjadi salah satu penyebab munculnya anggaran aneh dalam rencana anggaran 2020.
Ketua F-PKS DPRD DKI M Arifin menyampaikan, sepeninggal Sandiaga Uno pada medio Agustus 2018 karena maju Pilpres, kinerja Anies dalam mengelola pemerintahan terganggu. Puncak terganggunya pemerintahan, kata Arifin, terjadi saat penyusunan anggaran 2020.
"Puncaknya, terlihat pada penyusunan anggaran 2020 saat ini, yang akhirnya ramai," ujar Arifin dalam keterangan tertulisnya, Jumat (1/11/2019).
PKS yang mendukung Anies di Pilgub DKI 2017 berharap Anies segera memiliki wagub. Diharapkan, wagub pendamping Anies memahami pengelolaan anggaran.
"Sudah saatnya, Pak Anies harus ada pendampingnya yang mengerti tentang postur anggaran, agar tidak terjadi lagi kesalahan dalam penyusunan, sebab kejadian ini tidak ada di tahun sebelumnya," kata Arifin.

Strange Budget of DKI, PKS: Time for Anies Must Have A Companion
02 Nov 2019, 05:14 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Faction of the Prosperous Justice Party (F-PKS) DKI DPRD pushed for a deputy governor to accompany Anies Baswedan in the Provincial Government. Because, F-PKS considers the vacancy of DKI-2 seats to be one of the causes of the emergence of a strange budget in the 2020 budget plan.
Chairman of the DKI Jakarta DPRD F-PKS F Arifin said, after the death of Sandiaga Uno in mid-August 2018 due to the upcoming Presidential Election, Anies's performance in managing the government was disrupted. The peak of government disruption, said Arifin, occurred during the 2020 budget formulation.
"The peak, seen in the current 2020 budget formulation, is finally crowded," Arifin said in his written statement, Friday (11/01/2019).
PKS who supports Anies in the 2017 DKI Pilgub hopes that Anies will soon have a Deputy Governor. It is hoped that the Vice Governor Anies understands budget management.
"It is time, Mr. Anies must have a companion who understands the budget posture, so there will be no mistakes in the preparation, because this incident did not exist in the previous year," Arifin said.
